title: Add collision check with sliding hash window
description: If hash bytes 0-3 collide, try 1-4, then 2-5, etc. SHA256 gives 32 bytes so plenty of room.

title: Implement formal state machine for issue transitions
description: Centralize all state transitions (claim/release/finish/close) into a single state machine. Use Transition enum + apply method on Issue. Makes valid transitions explicit and invalid ones unrepresentable.

title: Add 'add' and 'new' aliases for create command
description: LLMs often try 'ba add' or 'ba new' first when creating issues. Add these as aliases for the create command.

title: Implement session management
description: Add session start/end/status commands for multi-agent coordination

title: Add README and initial commit
description: Create README with usage docs, commit and push to repo

title: Add labels and comments support
description: Add label and comment commands per spec

title: Populate Cargo.toml for publishing
description: Add license, authors, repository, keywords etc for crates.io publishing

title: Implement import from beads
description: Add import command to read bd export JSONL and convert to ba format

comments.author: claude
comments.text: Need to handle beads format differences

title: Implement dependency management (block/unblock)
description: Add block, unblock, tree commands for dependency tracking

title: Add claim/release for sessions
description: Add claim, release, mine commands for session-based issue claiming

title: Build barebones CLI
description: Implement init, create, list, show, close, update commands

title: Remove assignee field from Issue
description: assignee is redundant with session_id for ownership. Remove from struct, serialization, and show output.

title: Implement ready queue
description: Add ready command showing unblocked open issues sorted by priority

title: Remove assignee field from Issue
description: assignee is redundant with session_id for ownership. Remove from struct, serialization, and show output.

title: Add priority command
description: Standalone command: ba priority <id> <value>. Replaces update --priority.

title: Update README with deps and ready commands
description: Add documentation for block, unblock, tree, cycles, ready commands

title: Remove update command
description: Delete the update command entirely. Status transitions via claim/release/finish/close. Priority via priority command.

title: Guard close to reject claimed issues
description: close becomes escape hatch only. Error if issue has session_id set - must release first or use finish.

title: Add file locking to Store - flock with exponential backoff retry
description: Why: Multi-instance dispatch needs atomic read/write. Without locking, concurrent claims cause race conditions. Done when: Store::load() and Store::save() use flock() with exponential backoff retry loop. Simple approach: try lock, if EWOULDBLOCK sleep and retry with backoff.

comments.author: anonymous
comments.text: Use separate .ba/lock file instead of locking the JSON directly. Cleaner - can lock before JSON exists, avoids truncation issues during save.

title: Add quickstart command for LLMs
description: Lightweight version of bd quickstart to help LLMs get up to speed

title: Update quickstart docs
description: Update quickstart command output to reflect new workflow: claim/release/finish/close model, priority command, no update command.

title: Add finish command (release + close)
description: New command that clears session_id and sets status to closed. The ownership-aware way to complete work.
